description: You stumble upon a glowing fountain. The water pulses with strange energy.

choices.label: Drink from the fountain
choices.outcomeText: You feel your vitality surging. (+10 Max HP)

choices.label: Reach into the water
choices.outcomeText: You find a handful of glittering gold! (+15 Gold)

description: A suspicious chest lies in your path. Its lock gleams wickedly.

choices.label: Leave the chest
choices.outcomeText: You decide not to risk it and move on.

description: You hear rustling and heavy breathing down the corridor. Could be trouble... or opportunity.

choices.label: Approach and engage
choices.outcomeText: You ready your deck and charge in!

choices.label: Sneak past quietly
choices.outcomeText: You avoid conflict and continue on your way.
